about_the_game:
This is the demo version of the female oriented RPG Deception.
I want to give you an idea of what kind of game it is.
This may be a game with a very niche setting. Please be sure to read the mine avoidance instructions before participating in the game. Otherwise there is a good chance that you will feel uncomfortable because of the odd setting.

name: 欺神弄鬼 Demo
